p: Results of blood test were as follows: White blood cell count, 10.82 × 10 9; neutrophils, 92%; C-reactive protein, 80 mg/L, and blood glucose, 7 mmol/L. Findings of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) examination were as follows: Total number of cells, 188 × 10 6/L; nucleated cells, 44 × 10 6/L; monocytes 37 × 10 6/L; multinucleated cells 7 × 10 6/L; protein, 0.65 g/L; glucose, 5.74 mmol/L, and chlorides, 120.4 mmol/L.
